label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_005
content:
## 2024-04-01 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 92
- Active: 90
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 9
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 2

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 21
- Mid Dose: 25
- High Dose: 24
- Placebo: 22

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 54.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 97.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 65.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 17.1
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 57.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 30.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 98.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 140.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 98.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 19.4
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 75.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 37.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 129.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 201.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 129.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 34.8
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 4.9
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 5.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 8.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 16.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 5.4

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 52.9
- Erythema Percentage: 26.9
- Swelling Percentage: 7.8
- Induration Percentage: 9.4
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 23.0

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 21.4
- Fatigue Percentage: 33.9
- Myalgia Percentage: 34.2
- Headache Percentage: 16.1
- Chills Percentage: 14.3

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K): Mean: 8.8
- WBC (K) SD: 1.4
- Lymphocyte Percentage: Mean: 28.8
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.7
- Neutrophil Percentage: Mean: 58.6
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.5
- Platelets (K): Mean: 244
- Platelets (K) SD: 38
- CRP (mg/L): Mean: 1.6
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.7
- Hemoglobin (g/dL): Mean: 13.4
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.8

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0507, Description: myalgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0573, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0595, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0591, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- Serology samples shipped to central immunology lab
- Vaccination day 6: 17 subjects received scheduled dose

### Notes
- Week 5: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 92 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
